data.title: Ayn Rand Bust
data.meta_description: A realistic sculpt of Ayn Rand, Famous American Writer and Philosopher. Perfect for display on the library shelf, entertainment center, office space, collector's gallery, and more. This model is available in two sizes: 7-inch and 12-inch (overall height) and five colors to choose from for the Bust and the Box Plinth.
data.text:
Celebrate the philosophy of Ayn Rand with this stunning 3D printed portrait bust. Made with high-quality PLA material, this realistic bust interprets the famous author's distinctive features and adds a touch of sophistication to your collection. The accompanying box plinth showcases Rand's name and lifetime on the front and her inspiring quote, "a creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others," on the back. Choose from 5 different base colors for both the bust and the box plinth to personalize this piece. Get yours today and add a piece of influential thought to your decor.

Ayn Rand was a Russian-American novelist, philosopher and playwright, born in 1905. She is best known for her novels "The Fountainhead" and "Atlas Shrugged" which promote her philosophy of Objectivism which emphasizes the importance of individualism, rationality and laissez-faire capitalism. She believed that the individual is the basic unit of reality and that reason is the only means of knowledge. Her works have had a significant influence on American politics and culture, and continue to be widely read and debated today.

Perfect for display on the library shelf, entertainment center, office space, collectorâ€™s gallery, in the classroom, and more. Makes a great gift for the Teacher, Professor, or history enthusiast in your life, or simply to add to your own collection of people who inspire you.

DIMENSIONS AND WEIGHTS

7-inch: 3.5" wide, 4" deep, 7" tall, and weighs 5 - 7 oz depending on geometry.

12-inch: 6.25" wide, 5" deep, 12" tall, and weighs 1 lb.

Note: Approximate measurements. The height measured includes the base.

FEATURES

Lightweight - Multiple busts can be displayed on floating shelves

Unique - Original artwork

Collectible - Over 180 subjects in our ever-growing library

3D Printed - Intersection of technology and art to bring a unique presentation

PRODUCT CARE

Washable in lukewarm soapy water.

3D PRINTING

This product is made using 3D printing technology. As with any 3D printed product, there may be slight variations in size and finish. This product is not intended for heavy use or load-bearing applications. The manufacturer and seller of this product do not accept any responsibility for any damages or injuries resulting from the use of this product. By purchasing and using this product, you acknowledge and accept these limitations and assume all risk associated with its use.

POLYLACTIC ACID (PLA PLASTIC)

This product is made using PLA (polylactic acid) plastic, a biodegradable, plant-based material. It is not recommended for use in high heat or humid environments as it may warp or degrade. It is also not suitable for heavy use or load-bearing applications. The manufacturer and seller of this product do not accept any responsibility for any damages or injuries resulting from the use of this product. By purchasing and using this product, you acknowledge and accept these limitations and assume all risk associated with its use.
